name: LabelGeometryMeasures
description: This tool computes various geometry measures on a label image, optionally using an intensity image, and outputs the results to a CSV file.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the input images (e.g., 2 for 2D, 3 for 3D).

inputs.name: Label Image
inputs.description: The label image on which geometry measures are computed.

inputs.name: Intensity Image
inputs.description: An optional intensity image for computing intensity-weighted measures. Use "none" or "na" if not provided.

inputs.name: CSV File
inputs.description: The output file where the geometry measures are written in CSV format.

output-files.name: Output CSV File
output-files.description: The CSV file containing the geometry measures.

author: ANTs developers
